prompt: Comment puis-je m'assurer que seuls les fichiers image ou PDF d'une taille maximale de 10 Mo peuvent être téléchargés en tant que pièces jointes sur l'ensemble du wiki?
expected_answer:
Pour vous assurer que seuls les fichiers image ou PDF d'une taille maximale de 10 Mo peuvent être téléchargés en tant que pièces jointes sur l'ensemble du wiki, suivez ces étapes:

**Étape 1: Configurer les types MIME autorisés**

Modifiez le fichier de configuration `xwiki.properties` dans votre installation et ajoutez ou mettez à jour la ligne suivante pour configurer les restrictions de type MIME par défaut au niveau de la ferme:
```
attachment.upload.allowList=image/*,application/pdf
```
Cela permettra uniquement les fichiers image (avec n'importe quel sous-type, par exemple `image/jpeg`, `image/png`, etc.) et les fichiers PDF à télécharger, et bloquera tous les autres types MIME.

**Étape 2: Configurer la taille maximale de la pièce jointe**

Pour définir la taille maximale de la pièce jointe sur 10 Mo, suivez ces étapes:

1. Allez sur `http://<votrewiki>/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=object`
2. Cliquez sur la ligne qui dit XWikiPreferences 0 (juste en dessous de la ligne qui dit Objects of type XWiki.XWikiPreferences (1))
3. Faites défiler jusqu'au champ qui dit Maximum Upload Size et changez le nombre en `10485760` (10 Mo en octets)
4. Faites défiler jusqu'en bas et cliquez sur "Enregistrer"
5. Répétez pour chaque (sous-)wiki pour lequel vous devez définir cette configuration!
ai_answer:
Sources: https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/I18N 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/AdminGuide/Configuration/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Exports 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Skins 


Pour restreindre les types de fichiers pouvant être téléchargés en tant que pièces jointes sur XWiki, ainsi que leur taille maximale, vous devez configurer les propriétés du fichier `xwiki.properties`. Voici comment vous pouvez procéder :

1. **Accéder au fichier `xwiki.properties` :** Ce fichier se trouve généralement dans le répertoire de configuration de votre installation XWiki. Par exemple, cela pourrait être dans `/etc/xwiki/` ou un chemin similaire.

2. **Configurer les types de fichiers autorisés :** Vous devez spécifier les types de fichiers autorisés dans la propriété `attachment.allowedMimeTypes`. Pour les images et les fichiers PDF, cela pourrait ressembler à :

   ```properties
   attachment.allowedMimeTypes=image/png,image/jpeg,image/gif,application/pdf
   ```

3. **Définir la taille maximale de fichier :** Assurez-vous de définir la taille maximale des pièces jointes via la propriété `attachment.maxSize`. Pour une taille maximale de 10 Mo, vous pouvez définir :

   ```properties
   attachment.maxSize=10485760
   ```

4. **Redémarrer XWiki :** Après avoir modifié le fichier `xwiki.properties`, redémarrez votre instance XWiki pour que les changements prennent effet.

En procédant ainsi, vous pourrez contrôler à la fois les types de fichiers pouvant être téléchargés et leur taille maximale sur votre wiki. Assurez-vous d'avoir les permissions nécessaires pour accéder et modifier le fichier de configuration.

sources.content:
**Contents*** [Preferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/I18N#HPreferences)
* [Switch to another language](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/I18N#HSwitchtoanotherlanguage)
* [Page translations](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/I18N#HPagetranslations)
* [Edit a translation](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/I18N#HEditatranslation)
XWiki can be set-up to support one or various languages.

XWiki has translations in 40 languages:

* [Bulgarian (bg)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/bg/)
* [Catalan (ca)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/ca/)
* [Czech (cs)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/cs/)
* [Danish (da)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/da/)
* [German (de)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/de/)
* [Greek (el)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/el/)
* [English (en)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/en/)
* [Spanish (es)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/es/)
* [Persian (fa)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/fa/)
* [French (fr)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/fr/)
* [Galician (gl)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/gl/)
* [Hindi (hi)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/hi/)
* [Croatian (hr)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/hr/)
* [Hungarian (hu)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/hu/)
* [Indonesian (id)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/id/)
* [Italian (it)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/it/)
* [Japanese (ja)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/ja/)
* [Cambodian (km)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/km/)
* [Korean (ko)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/ko/)
* [Lithuanian (lt)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/lt/)
* [Latvian (lv)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/lv/)
* [Marathi (mr)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/mr/)
* [Dutch (nl)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/nl/)
* [Norwegian (no)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/no/)
* [Polish (pl)](https://l10n.xwiki.org/languages/pl/)

[Tour](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Tour%20Application)  
Let users create tour guides for any page

![administration.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Administration%20Application/administration.png?rev=1.3)

[Administration](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Administration%20Application)  
Application for administrating wiki features like users, groups, rights etc.

![application_side_tree](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/application_side_tree.png?cache-version=1711538035000)

[Application Index](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Application%20Index%20Application/)  
Displays the list of installed Applications

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Mail](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Mail/MailApplication)  
Administration UI for mail configuration and statuses

![palette](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/palette.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Flamingo Theme](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Flamingo%20Theme%20Application)  
Visually customize any Flamingo-based skin and preview the results live + Default Themes

![cog](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/cog.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Image Style](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Image/Style/UI/)  
Provide the UI to access the image styles on the Administration.

![page_white_acrobat](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/page_white_acrobat.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[PDF Export](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/PDF%20Export%20Application/)  
Adds support for exporting wiki pages to PDF on the client-side using the web browser.

![x-office-document.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Office%20Importer%20Application/x-office-document.png?rev=1.3)

## Trusted domains

By default redirections are only allowed to the trusted domains of the wiki. Those trusted domains are coming from two sources:  
  - all domains used to access the wiki are trusted by definition, as well as the aliases used for subwikis,  
  - in xwiki.properties it's possible to specify the property url.trustedDomains to specify other domains that should be trusted.

In case a redirection is attempted on a domain not trusted, a warning is displayed in logs and the redirection is prevented.  
Note that this whole mechanism can be switched off by settings url.trustedDomainsEnabled to false in xwiki.properties.

# Customizing the PDF export Look & Feel

* The default PDF export is now using the [client-side PDF Export Application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/PDF%20Export%20Application/). The documentation below is for the older server-side PDF export (implemented with Apache FOP)
## General Architecture

Here's how the PDF and RTF exports currently work:  
![XWikiExport201010290119.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/AdminGuide/Configuration/WebHome/XWikiExport201010290119.png?rev=1.1)

As shown in the diagram you can customize 4 parts:

## ODT Export

If you configure your wiki to work with an office server ([LibreOffice](http://www.libreoffice.org/) or [OpenOffice](http://www.openoffice.org/)) as described in the [Office Importer Application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Office%20Importer%20Application) you'll notice a new entry in the Export Modal (as long as you are connected to the office server). Only single-page ODT export is supported at the moment.

You can tweak the export URL to export to other office formats supported by your office server. For instance /xwiki/bin/export/Sandbox/WebHome?format=doc exports Sandbox.WebHome page to Microsoft Word's proprietary DOC format.

## PDF Export

XWiki 14.10+ Support for PDF export is provided by the [PDF Export Application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/PDF%20Export%20Application/) which is bundled by default in XWiki Standard. Checkout its documentation for more information.

XWiki <14.10 On older versions of XWiki the PDF export was implemented using Apache FOP (Formatting Objects Processor). This implementation is replaced, by default, by the browser-based (client-side) PDF export provided by the PDF Export Application. You can restore the old implementation, if you want, from the PDF Export Application configuration.

The old PDF Export has a UI interface to manage the export:

![pdfExportOptions.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/Exports/pdfExportOptions.png?rev=1.5)

| [notificationsSystemFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsSystemFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications System Filters Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the given user about system notification filters. | Current Wiki |
| office | Office Document Viewer | Content | View office attachments (doc, ppt, xls, odt, odp, ods etc.) inside wiki pages without downloading or importing them. | Global |
| pdftoc | PDF Table of Contents | Internal | Generates the table of contents for the PDF export. | Global |
| [pdfviewer](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/PDFViewerMacro) | PDF Viewer | Content | PDF Viewer based on Mozilla pdf.js | Current Wiki |
| plantuml | PlantUML | Content | Convert various text input formats into diagram images using PlantUML. | Global |
| [pollsrecent](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XPoll/RecentPollsMacro) | Recent Polls |  | Displays the N most recent polls. | Current Wiki |
| [poweredBy](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWikiOrgCode/PoweredBy) | Powered By |  | Displays a random reference summary | Global |
| [productVersions](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/ProductVersionMacro/) | Product Versions | content | Display product versions for testing | Global |
| putFootnotes | Put Footnotes | Content | Displays all the footnotes from the page. If missing, all footnotes are displayed by default at the end of the page. | Global |
| python | Python | Development | Executes a python script. | Global |
| [releasenotechanges](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Code/Change/ReleaseNotesChangesMacro) | Release Note Changes | content |  | Current Wiki |
| [remotecode](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/RemoteCodeMacro) | Remote Code |  | Displays the code (using the code macro) of a remote file | Global |
| [scm](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/SCM) | scm | Documentation | Produce scm link | Global |
